lines.text: At every turn of the road the warning was there, but I refused to see it!
I am not a Christian. Christianity is a faith that betrays its believers!
[taking off her rosary and throwing it down]
But, Teresa is to be my bride!
Teresa is now the Bride of Christ!
What do you think you're doing?

[trying to convince Teresa to elope with him rather than becoming a nun]
They'll cut your hair, Teresa. They'll shear it off.
